definition: prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)

sentences.english: "Are you ill, dear Aslan?" asked Susan.
sentences.chinese: “你病了吗，亲爱的阿斯兰？”苏珊问道。

sentences.english: "But where is the fourth?" asked Aslan.
sentences.chinese: “可是第四个在哪儿呢？”阿斯兰问。

sentences.english: And there on the field of battle Aslan made him a knight.
sentences.chinese: 阿斯兰就在战场上封他为骑士。

sentences.english: "Son of Adam, " said Aslan, "you have sown well.
sentences.chinese: “亚当的儿子，”阿斯兰说，“你栽得很好。

sentences.english: He soon did hear nothing but roaring in Aslan's song.
sentences.chinese: 很快，他从阿斯兰的歌声中便只听见狮吼了。

sentences.english: "What is your message, Son of Earth?" asked Aslan.
sentences.chinese: “你带来什么口信，大地的儿子？”阿斯兰问。

definition: Loki, god of fire and mischievous destroyer in Norse mythology
Jeanne d'Arc (1412-1431), French heroine and liberator, executed as a witch by the Burgundians and English/also called Jehanne Darc, the Maid or Orleans, Joan of Arc or St Joan
Barth or Barthes (name)/Roland Barthes (1915-1980), French critic and semiotician
Clark T. Randt Jr. (1945-), US ambassador to Beijing 2001-2009
